note:
Retired but not dead iconoclast/dilettante and lover of wordplay. Sarcasm is my default mode.

Stay-at-home househusband. Retired. Married but not dead. Something of a snarker with a penchant for wordplay. I discovered sci-fi at an early age and got hooked. Still an avid reader even though my book buying has slowed down. my collection is voluminous enough to sustain me.
